member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for ads functionality.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsModule.GetAdsToDisplayAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the ads to display based on the query data.
member.param: The type of the ad. Possible values are 'banner' and 'fullscreen'.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: The details of the ads to display.
member.exception: Thrown when the input values are invalid.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsModule.GetByIdAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves an ad by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the ad to retrieve.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: The details of the retrieved ad.
member.exception: Thrown when the input value is invalid.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsModule.GetByIdsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves ads by their IDs.
member.param: The IDs of the ads to retrieve.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: The details of the retrieved ads.
member.exception: Thrown when the input values are invalid.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsModule.GetByTagsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves ads by tags.
member.param: The tags of the ads to retrieve.
The maximum number of ads to return.
The updatedAt timestamp to start after. Optional.
Whether to ignore the timestamp filter. Optional.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: The details of the retrieved ads.
member.exception: Thrown when the input values are invalid.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData
member.summary: Represents a Marketplace Offer in the Ready Games Network (RGN) with its associated properties.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the ad.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.title
member.summary: The title of the ad.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.description
member.summary: The description of the ad.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.redirectUrls
member.summary: The URLs per platform to redirect when the ad is clicked.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.previewBinaryUrl
member.summary: The preview binary URL of the ad.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.binaryUrl
member.summary: The ad binary URL of the ad.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.isActive
member.summary: Indicates whether the ad is active.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.time
member.summary: The time configuration for the ad. 'start' and 'end' are used to determine if the ad is available.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.tags
member.summary: The tags associated with the ad.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.random
member.summary: The random configuration for the ad, used to determine ad fetch behavior.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.viewLimit
member.summary: The absolute limit of the ad views.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.viewLimitPerUser
member.summary: The limit of the ad views per user. -1 means no limit.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.type
member.summary: The type of the ad. Possible values are 'banner' and 'fullscreen'.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.currentViewLimit
member.summary: The current view limit of the ad, serving as a counter for the ad views.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.clickCounter
member.summary: The counter for the ad clicks.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.createdAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the ad was created, in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Automatically populated by the backend.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.updatedAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the ad was last updated, in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Automatically populated by the backend.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.createdBy
member.summary: The user ID of who created the ad. Automatically populated by the backend.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdData.updatedBy
member.summary: The user ID of who last updated the ad. Automatically populated by the backend.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Ads.RandomConfig
member.summary: Represents the random configuration for the ad, to determine ad fetch behavior.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Ads.RandomConfig.config
member.summary: Configuration details for randomness in ad selection

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdDataResponseData
member.summary: Response data for a single ad retrieval.

member.name: P:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdDataResponseData.ad
member.summary: The retrieved ad data.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsResponseData
member.summary: Response data for multiple ads retrieval.

member.name: P:RGN.Modules.Ads.AdsResponseData.ads
member.summary: The list of retrieved ads.
